DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test feasibility acceptability online platform us mobile apps videoconferencing tool increase activity level mother young child .
DOC.brief_title: The Moms Online Video Exercise Study
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator test feasibility acceptability digital health platform use randomize parallel wait-list control design mother young child . The platform incorporate home base supportive group exercise session use video conferencing tool , share online activity track exercise mobile apps individualize exercise routine help mother increase physical activity level successful maintain increase . The intervention arm consist two main part : home base video conferencing virtual exercise session mobile exercise apps , woman use tailor exercise routine skill level preference . Both arm receive activity monitor collect continuous activity data throughout study .
DOC.criteria: Mother least one child le 18 year old Owns smart phone ( iPhone Android ) download mobile application Sufficient data use mobile application mobile device Owns mobile device web camera Inability provide inform consent Inability speak understand English Any medical restriction vigorous activity recommend Any history heart condition include cardiovascular disease coronary artery disease Any history heart condition include cardiovascular disease coronary artery disease Meets federal guideline exercise either aerobic ( 150 minute moderate activity per week , 75 minute vigorous activity per week , combination ) Pregnant plan get pregnant study duration
